text: ah oke. NBut is verticial scrolling then possible as well *in tables*?

Hey <@U02NYPGH124>. Our React Renderer is served from a different url than our regular HubSpot app and has different CSP configurations. We will do some more digging to see if we can make any changes here :+1:

Hi <@U04EJHVD8FM>. Thanks for the response! :slightly_smiling_face:
I hope its CSP can cater HubSpot-hosted apps as this would affect the user experience of our solution.

it’s finally here!! watch me and <@U03FJQPSC0Y>’s INBOUND talk on :sparkles: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3Ot7WvdVZM|CRM UI Customization> :sparkles: feel free to share widely with your teams! special appearances by <@U01QVR44MEY>, <@U032JBY6BAR>, and <@U05ABQULENT> :eyes:

*NEW SAMPLE ALERT*:bell::sprocket-dance:: Curious about how to work with the Iframe modal within our custom cards? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects#display-an-iframe-modal|Here’s a quick sample> that shows how to open an external web page from inside the custom card via a popup iframe. See the GIF below for more details!

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects|Here’s a link> to the previous sample projects for more inspiration on what can be created with our CRM development tools.

Following up on this and our conversation earlier <@U04UQ8CTT32>: we just added a sample that shows <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects#display-an-iframe-modal|how to open a popup iframe>. Slack announcement <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1701804067599139|here>
Hey <@U04EJHVD8FM>, can you update me in your earliest convenience if this matter can be solved? Thank you! :slightly_smiling_face:
